p.span: All School are closed indefinitely at this time. We will update you as soon as can.

div.p: Platteville School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, or disability in admission to its programs, services, or activities, in access to them, in treatment of individuals, or in any aspect of their operations. The lack of English language skills shall not be a barrier to admission or participation in the district's activities and programs. Platteville School District Schools also does not discriminate in its hiring or employment practices.
